columns.star_rating_code: The unique code identifying each hotel star rating.
columns.star_rating_description: The descriptive label for each hotel star rating.

Ref_Hotel_Star_Ratings.table_description: The table lists defined star ratings for hotels.

columns.Location_ID: The unique identifier for each location within the database.
columns.Location_Name: The name given to each specific location.
columns.Address: The physical address of the location.
columns.Other_Details: The additional information related to the location.

Locations.table_description: The table stores location details for theme parks.

columns.Market_ID: The unique identifier for each street market.
columns.Market_Details: The detailed description of the street market.

Street_Markets.table_description: The table holds details of street markets for tourist attractions.

columns.Shop_ID: The unique identifier for each shop in the theme park.
columns.Shop_Details: The description of the products offered by the shop.

Shops.table_description: The table contains details of shops within the theme park.

columns.Attraction_Type_Code: The unique code identifying each type of attraction.
columns.Attraction_Type_Description: The description of each specific type of attraction.

Ref_Attraction_Types.table_description: The table categorizes types of attractions offered in the theme park.

columns.Theme_Park_ID: The unique identifier for each theme park in the database.
columns.Theme_Park_Details: The detailed information about each theme park.

Theme_Parks.table_description: The table provides details of various theme parks available.

columns.Visit_ID: The unique identifier for each visit to an attraction.
columns.Tourist_Attraction_ID: The identifier of the attraction being visited.
columns.Tourist_ID: The unique identifier for the tourist making the visit.
columns.Visit_Date: The date and time when the visit occurred.
columns.Visit_Details: The additional information regarding the specifics of the visit.

Visits.table_description: The table logs visits made by tourists to attractions.

columns.Photo_ID: The unique identifier for each photo in the database.
columns.Tourist_Attraction_ID: The identifier for the attraction that the photo represents.
columns.Name: The given name for the photo to identify it.
columns.Description: The description provides context for the photo.
columns.Filename: The filename used to store the photo in the system.
columns.Other_Details: The additional information regarding the photo.

Photos.table_description: The table catalogs photos associated with tourist attractions.

columns.Staff_ID: The unique identifier for each staff member within the theme park.
columns.Tourist_Attraction_ID: The identifier for the attraction the staff member works at.
columns.Name: The name of the staff member for identification purposes.
columns.Other_Details: The additional information regarding the staff member.

Staff.table_description: The table stores information about staff members in the theme park.

columns.Tourist_Attraction_ID: The unique identifier for each tourist attraction.
columns.Feature_ID: The unique identifier for each feature of attractions.

Tourist_Attraction_Features.table_description: The table links features to specific tourist attractions.

columns.Tourist_ID: The unique identifier for each tourist visiting the theme park.
columns.Tourist_Details: The name or details of the tourist for identification.

Visitors.table_description: The table lists tourists visiting the theme park.

columns.Feature_ID: The unique identifier for each feature within the theme park.
columns.Feature_Details: The description of the specific feature offered.

Features.table_description: The table catalogs various features available at the theme park.

columns.hotel_id: The unique identifier for each hotel listed in the database.
columns.star_rating_code: The code representing the hotel's star rating category.
columns.pets_allowed_yn: The indicator of whether pets are allowed at the hotel.
columns.price_range: The price range for accommodations at the hotel.
columns.other_hotel_details: The additional information and features of the hotel.

Hotels.table_description: The table stores information about hotels available at the theme park.

columns.Tourist_Attraction_ID: The unique identifier for each tourist attraction.
columns.Attraction_Type_Code: The code indicating the type of attraction.
columns.Location_ID: The identifier for the location of the attraction.
columns.How_to_Get_There: The instructions on reaching the attraction.
columns.Name: The name of the tourist attraction.
columns.Description: The detailed description of the attraction.
columns.Opening_Hours: The hours during which the attraction is accessible.
columns.Other_Details: The additional information about the attraction.

Tourist_Attractions.table_description: The table catalogs all tourist attractions available in the theme park.

columns.Museum_ID: The unique identifier for each museum in the park.
columns.Museum_Details: The name or description of the museum.

Museums.table_description: The table lists museums featured as attractions in the theme park.

columns.Royal_Family_ID: The unique identifier for each royal family member.
columns.Royal_Family_Details: The description or details about the royal family member.

Royal_Family.table_description: The table lists details of royal family members associated with attractions.
